item.title: JCW URLs
item.description: Live Mag Jeff’s 14 issue, 40 page art and poetry mag Empty Mirror Collages Poets Reading the News Jeff’s illustrated political poetry The Key Ceremony Community Garden Event, associated art and performance. Clubhouse on East 13th Don Yorty’s video of a preview reading, at Sidewalk Cafe, of Jeff’s play Clubhouse on East 13th featuring Wright, Hillary Keel, Debra Jenks, Surge, Jane LeCroy, Anders Goldfarb, and

item.title: Upcoming Events
item.description: May 21 Triangle Quarterly, hosted by Anton Yakovlev: Lynne Desilva-Johnson, Neil Shepard, and Jeffrey Cyphers Wright read at the Bowery Poetry Club 6 - 8 pm June 6 LiVE MAG! Presents Poetryville Express: Elaine Equi and Paul Hoover read at KGB Bar at 7pm. MC Jeffrey Cyphers Wright
